data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Tigres have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez just outside Tigres's area.
In the minute 8, Jesus Duenas (Tigres) has received a first yellow card.
Juarez are coming forward and Gustavo Velazquez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, Tigres have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres.
Jose Jaoquin Esquivel (Juarez) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 13, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Throw-in Tigres.
In the minute 19, Free kick Tigres.
Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In Nuevo Leon Juarez attack through Dario Lezcano. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Jorge Perez awards Juarez a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Nuevo Leon Tigres drive forward through Rafael Carioca. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 29, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
Juarez have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Juarez's Dario Lezcano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 33, Andre Pierre Gignac for Tigres gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 39, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez awards Tigres a goal kick.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Andre Pierre Gignac gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tigres.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first-half is over at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Javier Aquino is booked for the home team.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 46, Carlos Salcedo is replacing Jesus Duenas for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Ricardo Ferretti is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Universitario (UANL) with Eduardo Vargas replacing Leonardo Fernandez.
In the minute 47, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Nicolas Lopez.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 53, Juarez are pushing forward but Mauro Fernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
Jorge Perez awards Tigres a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 54, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Juarez territory.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 60, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jorge Perez signals a Juarez throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 65, Eduardo Vargas of Tigres gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) is making a first substitution, with William Mendieta replacing Francisco Contreras.
The away team replace Victor Omar Manon with Martin Luis Galvan.
In the minute 69, Juarez have a goal kick.
Dario Lezcano is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Maximiliano Olivera instrumental with a fine assist.
Jorge Perez awards Tigres a goal kick.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Alan Mendoza with Blas Armoa. This is the third substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
Free kick in a good position for Juarez!
In the minute 74, Carlos Salcedo (Tigres) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Hedgardo Marin (Juarez) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Tigres are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 80, Martin Luis Galvan is booked for the away team.
Tigres are coming forward and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 84, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Juarez have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Juarez close to the penalty box.
In the minute 86, In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jorge Perez will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Juarez close to the penalty box.
Jorge Perez awards Tigres a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Bruno Romo is on a sub for Luis Lopez for Juarez.
Juarez make their fifth substitution with Flavio Santos replacing Mauro Fernandez.
